channel.title: Categories on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Categories
item.description: SPECIFICATIONS - CATALOG > CATEGORIES Grid CategoryGridDefinitionFactory.php If the category has at least 1 children category Default action in the button: View Other available actions in the menu: Edit, Delete Row action: View If the category does not have children category Default action in the button: Edit Other available actions in the menu: Edit, Delete Row action: Edit Row action does not apply to the ID’s checkbox column and to columns with enable/disable actions.

item.title: Category Page
item.description: SPECS CATEGORY PAGE As a merchant I need to be able to correctly create, edit and delete my categories. SPECIFICATIONS When i disable a category, I expect it to still be present in as a parent in the category tree (issue 14790)
